alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallatin County through 630 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Divide Lake, or 21 miles north of West Yellowstone, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Gallatin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
